title: Stalked by the Irishman
description: One look.That's all it took for me to fall hopelessly in love with Rachel.My Rachel.I'll do anything for her.The pretty little barista doesn't even know me.But I make it my mission to know everything about her.When circumstances force me to come out of the shadows, she's even more perfect than I ever imagined.But keeping my obsession under control is impossible, and it could ruin everything.
author: Emma Bray
